snippet.title: Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine - Movie Trailer
snippet.description:
A movie trailer I made based on the computer game Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine. This is the second of (hopefully) four Indy videogame trailers I plan to make. The first, based on Fate of Atlantis, can be seen on my YouTube page.

This one's loosely based on the second Kingdom of the Crystal Skull trailer... although I think that one would've been massively improved by including Devo's 'Whip It' at the end.

Thanks to Hal Barwood LucasArts for making the last ever (mostly) PC exclusive Indiana Jones game, John Williams for his excellent film scores used here, Clint Bajakian for his superb game scores which sadly I couldn't fit in here, and YouTube for hosting of course!

Visit IndyJones.net and Mixnmojo.com for more Indiana Jones gaming-related information!
